verses.verse: And it came to pass, <WH1961> when all <WH3605> the kings <WH4428> of the Amorites, <WH567> which <WH834> were on the side <WH5676> of Jordan <WH3383> westward, <WH3220> and all <WH3605> the kings <WH4428> of the Canaanites, <WH3669> which <WH834> were by <WH5921> the sea, <WH3220> heard <WH8085> <WH853> that <WH834> the LORD <WH3068> had dried up <WH3001> <WH853> the waters <WH4325> of Jordan <WH3383> from before <WH4480> <WH6440> the children <WH1121> of Israel, <WH3478> until <WH5704> we were passed over, <WH5674> that their heart <WH3824> melted, <WH4549> neither <WH3808> was <WH1961> there spirit <WH7307> in them any more, <WH5750> because <WH4480> <WH6440> of the children <WH1121> of Israel. <WH3478>

At that <WH1931> time <WH6256> the LORD <WH3068> said <WH559> unto <WH413> Joshua, <WH3091> Make <WH6213> thee sharp <WH6864> knives, <WH2719> and circumcise <WH4135> again <WH7725> <WH853> the children <WH1121> of Israel <WH3478> the second <WH8145> time.
And Joshua <WH3091> made <WH6213> him sharp <WH6864> knives, <WH2719> and circumcised <WH4135> <WH853> the children <WH1121> of Israel <WH3478> at <WH413> the hill <WH1389> of the foreskins. <WH6190>

And this <WH2088> is the cause <WH1697> why <WH834> Joshua <WH3091> did circumcise: <WH4135> All <WH3605> the people <WH5971> that came out <WH3318> of Egypt, <WH4480> <WH4714> that were males, <WH2145> even all <WH3605> the men <WH376> of war, <WH4421> died <WH4191> in the wilderness <WH4057> by the way, <WH1870> after they came out <WH3318> of Egypt. <WH4480> <WH4714>

Now <WH3588> all <WH3605> the people <WH5971> that came out <WH3318> were <WH1961> circumcised: <WH4135> but all <WH3605> the people <WH5971> that were born <WH3209> in the wilderness <WH4057> by the way <WH1870> as they came forth <WH3318> out of Egypt, <WH4480> <WH4714> them they had not <WH3808> circumcised. <WH4135>

For <WH3588> the children <WH1121> of Israel <WH3478> walked <WH1980> forty <WH705> years <WH8141> in the wilderness, <WH4057> till <WH5704> all <WH3605> the people <WH1471> that were men <WH376> of war, <WH4421> which came out <WH3318> of Egypt, <WH4480> <WH4714> were consumed, <WH8552> because <WH834> they obeyed <WH8085> not <WH3808> the voice <WH6963> of the LORD: <WH3068> unto whom <WH834> the LORD <WH3068> swore <WH7650> that he would not <WH1115> show <WH7200> them <WH853> the land, <WH776> which <WH834> the LORD <WH3068> swore <WH7650> unto their fathers <WH1> that he would give <WH5414> us, a land <WH776> that floweth <WH2100> with milk <WH2461> and honey. <WH1706>

And their children, <WH1121> whom he raised up <WH6965> in their stead, <WH8478> them Joshua <WH3091> circumcised: <WH4135> for <WH3588> they were <WH1961> uncircumcised, <WH6189> because <WH3588> they had not <WH3808> circumcised <WH4135> them by the way. <WH1870>

And it came to pass, <WH1961> when <WH834> they had done <WH8552> circumcising <WH4135> all <WH3605> the people, <WH1471> that they abode <WH3427> in their places <WH8478> in the camp, <WH4264> till <WH5704> they were whole. <WH2421>

And the LORD <WH3068> said <WH559> unto <WH413> Joshua, <WH3091> This day <WH3117> have I rolled away <WH1556> <WH853> the reproach <WH2781> of Egypt <WH4714> from off <WH4480> <WH5921> you. Wherefore the name <WH8034> of the place <WH4725> is called <WH7121> Gilgal <WH1537> unto <WH5704> this <WH2088> day. <WH3117>

And the children <WH1121> of Israel <WH3478> encamped <WH2583> in Gilgal, <WH1537> and kept <WH6213> <WH853> the passover <WH6453> on the fourteenth <WH702> <WH6240> day <WH3117> of the month <WH2320> at even <WH6153> in the plains <WH6160> of Jericho. <WH3405>

And they did eat <WH398> of the old corn <WH4480> <WH5669> of the land <WH776> on the morrow after <WH4480> <WH4283> the passover, <WH6453> unleavened cakes, <WH4682> and parched <WH7033> corn in the selfsame <WH6106> <WH2088> day. <WH3117>

And the manna <WH4478> ceased <WH7673> on the morrow <WH4480> <WH4283> after they had eaten <WH398> of the old corn <WH4480> <WH5669> of the land; <WH776> neither <WH3808> had <WH1961> the children <WH1121> of Israel <WH3478> manna <WH4478> any more; <WH5750> but they did eat <WH398> of the fruit <WH4480> <WH8393> of the land <WH776> of Canaan <WH3667> that <WH1931> year. <WH8141>

And it came to pass, <WH1961> when Joshua <WH3091> was <WH1961> by Jericho, <WH3405> that he lifted up <WH5375> his eyes <WH5869> and looked, <WH7200> and, behold, <WH2009> there stood <WH5975> a man <WH376> over against <WH5048> him with his sword <WH2719> drawn <WH8025> in his hand: <WH3027> and Joshua <WH3091> went <WH1980> unto him, <WH413> and said <WH559> unto him, Art thou <WH859> for us, or <WH518> for our adversaries? <WH6862>

And he said, <WH559> Nay; <WH3808> but <WH3588> as captain <WH8269> of the host <WH6635> of the LORD <WH3068> am I <WH589> now <WH6258> come. <WH935> And Joshua <WH3091> fell <WH5307> on <WH413> his face <WH6440> to the earth, <WH776> and did worship, <WH7812> and said <WH559> unto him, What <WH4100> saith <WH1696> my lord <WH113> unto <WH413> his servant? <WH5650>

And the captain <WH8269> of the LORD's <WH3068> host <WH6635> said <WH559> unto <WH413> Joshua, <WH3091> Loose <WH5394> thy shoe <WH5275> from off <WH4480> <WH5921> thy foot; <WH7272> for <WH3588> the place <WH4725> whereon <WH834> <WH5921> thou <WH859> standest <WH5975> is holy. <WH6944> And Joshua <WH3091> did <WH6213> so. <WH3651>
